Description: Through_Lanes: Counter_Peak_Lanes + Peak_Lanes Must Be >= Through Lanes (x)
Counter Peak Lanes: NULL if FACILITY_TYPE is 1 (16)
Speed Limit: Divisible by 5 and < 90 OR = 999 (15)
Single Unit / Combination: SU AADT + CU AADT < (0.8*AADT) (17)
Signal_Type: Where F_System = 1 and Urban Code <> 99999, Signal_Type should = 5 or Null (y)
Median Width: NULL if (FACILITY_TYPE is 1 or 4) or Median_Type Code <2 (20)
Widening_Obstacle: must contain A-G where Widening_Potential <9 (23)
IRI, Rutting, Faulting, Cracking Percent: Value_Date >= Year_Record – 2\nWhere Sample OR (Value_Text is Null AND F_System >1 and NHS in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9) ) (46)
IRI, Rutting, Faulting, Cracking Percent: Value_Date = Year Record\n  Where Value_Text is Null AND F_System =1  (61)
IRI, Rutting, Faulting, Cracking Percent: Value_Text In (A,B,C,D) Where\nValue_Date <> Year Record and F_Sytem = 1 OR (Value_Date < Year Record -2 on NHS) (64)
PSR: Value_Date >= Year_Record – 2 Where\nSample OR F_System >1 and NHS in (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9) (65)
PSR: Value_Date = Year Record  Where Value_Text is "A" AND F_System =1  (66)
IRI and PSR: Where F_System =1, and IRI is Null,\nPSR Value_Numeric > 0 and PSR Value_Text = A (62)
Cracking_Percent: Should be < X where Surface Type is in (2,6,7,8)
Cracking_Percent: < 75 Where Surface Type is in (3,4,5,9,10)  (51)
Sample: only allow where Facility_Type IN 1,2 and\n(F_System = 1-5 or F_System = 6 and Urban Code <99999) (2)
TOPS Not Found: No TOPS record was created for a given section of the network.  One or more of the five TOPS data items is likely missing from this section. (4)
